Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Barring a rainout, the Dayton Dragons of the Class A Midwest League will have their 815th consecutive sellout on Saturday, a national sports record.
snippet: Barring a rainout, the Dayton Dragons of the Class A Midwest League will have their 815th consecutive sellout on Saturday, a national sports record.
